name: RBT Prototype
description:
We are happy to announce our first game!
"RBT Admission Program" was made in 72h by out team of developers. 
It is a thrilling point and click psychological horror experience.

We recommend you activate hardware acceleration in your browser.

We hope you enjoy it!
Special thanks to our teachers Diego Mello and Renato de Medeiros, who helped us to step into this big ever-growing industry.
